entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Test failure when AOT'ed with SIMD support - `JSException : TypeError: globalThis.WebSocket is not a constructor` #75098
  • [wasm] Add Vector128.Min and Max for WebAssembly #75094
    8.0.0
  • Various Runtime assert failures on both Windows and Linux #75091
  • IConfiguration.GetValue<T>() is no longer defined in .NET 6 #75089
  • Erroneous leading space in ShortTimePattern and LongTimePattern in Burmese Cultures ({my} and {my-MM}) #75087
  • Grpc.Net.Common .NETStandard is missing "Grpc.Net.Compression.DeflateCompressionProvider" #75086
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 Dot and Sum intrinsics on WebAssembly #75084
    8.0.0
  • sendtohelixhelp.proj always includes openssl as a Helix correlation payload #75080
    8.0.0
  • Kestrel TLS handshake fails for every 2nd request when specifying the ClientCertificateMode.AllowCertificate option on Linux with .NET 7 #75079

Closed

  • ubsan discovers out of bounds array access in runtime/src/native/external/libunwind/src/aarch64/Ginit.c #74390
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\VectorDot_r\\VectorDot_r.cmd #74913
  • Unused variable addrCostSzDelta in gentree.cpp #75071
  • AV in GetITypeInfoForMT #75035
    7.0.0
  • standard2.0 Type.IsAssignableFrom not work #74700
  • NCL stress tests fail to build since ProductVersion update to 8.0.0 #74604
    8.0.0
  • Cache Task.FromResult(String.Empty) or Task.FromResult("") #75077
  • Assertion failed 'isGeneralRegister(reg3)' #74117
    7.0.0
  • native build, missing meta exception #75053
  • [mono] Tests failed on windows: System.Net.*.Tests #34690
    Future
  • NET7 Int128, UInt128 - bugs in ToString #75072
  • Nullability annotation missing on CacheControlHeaderValue.TryParse #74061
    8.0.0
  • There is room for improvement in the performance of the Stream.Write #75076
  • Utf8JsonWriter.WriteCommentValue() method overloads behavior differently #75075
  • [Tests] System.Net.Quic.Tests System.Exception : Failed to create MsQuicApi instance #74952
    7.0.0
  • Question: finding architecture using System.Reflection.Metadata #74040
  • Requesting a net35 target for the S.R.Metadata package #25198
    Future
  • Does CoreFX library support NI file, including both FNV and R2R ? #23487
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Initialization failures logging #75097
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use analyzers from targeting pack for NetCoreAppCurrent #75093
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] fix prefetch in samples #75092
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #75088
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Enable DOTNET_JitStdOutFile in Release #75085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Enable HTTP & SSL stress runs on release/7.0 #75082
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Fix unrecognized unaligned field indirections on ARM32 #75078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior. #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix undefined behavior issues in aarch64 #75029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix W^X flag for setting `ITypeInfo` #75045
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix typo in gentree.cpp #75081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NCL stress tests after ProductVersion upgrade #75026
    area-System.Net
  • Remove duplicate SourceGeneration generator refs #75083
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid allocations in ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync in the common case #75025
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Enable a bunch of System.Net tests on Windows #75010
    area-System.Net
  • Add nullability annotation on CacheControlHeaderValue #74863
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add missing documentation to System.Net.Quic and System.Net.WebSockets #74945
    area-System.Net
  • Use ConfigureAwait(false) #74982
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix SharedLibrary smoke test build on osx-arm64 #74989
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Floor and Ceiling intrinsics for amd64 #74936
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] add simd testing on ci #75064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix W^X flag for setting `ITypeInfo` #75046
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 SQRT intrinsics for amd64 #74865
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add guard word before local var CMiniColDef[9] #73736
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] SIMD related build fixes #75042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update Roslyn compiler build #75058
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Change LibrariesConfiguration defaults in tests #75033
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix Mono Windows x86 build and runtime crash. #74639
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Throw on incompatible WebSocket options #75014
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Encode UserName value in UriBuilder (Issue #74662) #74953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Rewrite interop in debugger tests #74990
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Disable TYP_BLK stressing for tail call to loop optimization #74999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix distribute free regions #74916
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #74669
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] [mono][jit] Zero extend the return when we might be invoking llvm generated code #74991
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Publishing static library should also publish other necessary static libs #1733

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [7.0.100-rc.2.22452.3] Blazor server apps, pass dynamic variable to a component doesn't build on .net7 #27678
  • hotReload fails with exception "Could not load type 'AspNetCoreGeneratedDocument" #27676
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.2.22452.3] Microsoft.NETCore.App runtime package has mismatched version #27675

PullRequests

Created

  • Bugfix: Report error on conditional params authoring errors #27684
  • [main] Disable publishing artifacts at build task of template engine job to fix the failure of uploading artifacts in CI #27679
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx]Disable publishing artifacts at build task of template engine job to fix the failure of uploading artifacts in CI #27674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27671

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1983954 #27672

Updated

  • Fix br compression size regression in Blazor WASM #27659
    arch-wasm, Area-AspNetCore
  • do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type #27648
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1984097 #27667
  • Implements standard dotnet options for controlling output in dotnet new #27628
    area: dotnet new
  • Apply the same editorconfig rules to TemplateEngine parts as dotnet/templating repo #27611
    Area-Compatibility
  • Lead to `dotnet new create <template name>` #27593
  • Update the rids in the test projects #27033
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Attributes on Main for top level programs #5045

    Any Time

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BC30064 when assigning a value to a ReadOnly variable in the constructor inside a With block #63807
  • Source Generators incompatible with .Net7 #63806
  • Analyzer suggestion: Convert private field to constructor local variable #63803

Closed

  • CS8374: Confusing error message for parameter escape scope #63797
  • CSharpSyntaxTree.ParseText does not parse comments #63804
  • Convert to file-scoped namespace when typing semi-colon fails in the presence of specific trivia #63792
  • IDE refactor to file-scope namespace corrupts C# file #63542

PullRequests

Created

  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63808
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix sourceroslyn link #63805
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63802
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve convert-to-file-scoped-namespace trivia handling. #63799
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AspCore 6 SignalR Groups.AddToGroupAsync Bug #43767
  • NullReferenceException when defining @page route with parameter #43763
  • Route Group is a fantastic feature to streamline code towards maintenance over decades with steep climb #43759
    Discussions
  • [Blazor .NET MUAI] Not all CSS cursor properties are functional #43758
  • [Blazor WebAssembly Project Template] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43755
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] cannot start a connection on linux arm #43753
  • Failed to authenticate HTTPS connection #43752
  • CascadingValue ignoring element's razor definition #43750
  • Publish Blazor wasm hosted with x64 Platform on the server results in RuntimeIdentifier compatibility exception #43749
    .NET 8 Planning
  • OutputCaching make IOutputCacheKeyProvider public #43747

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes #43740
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #43742
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes_actix #43748
  • Roma #43766
  • Web API error response for malformed json using Text.Json is misleading and is exposing internals. #40202
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext, plaintext_nodejs #43743
  • Swagger / OpenAPI support in gRPC JSON transcoding #43294

PullRequests

Created

  • Update tests to reflect change of web app manifest extension in React C# template #43765
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fixed summary for FileStream property. #43764
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `afd902e` to `0e0d9fe` #43762
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `1edf19d` to `ec91da8` #43761
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Add query parameters to gRPC transcoding OpenAPI #43751
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Add framework to gRPC template's dotnetcli.host.json #43746
    area-mvc, area-grpc
  • [release/7.0] Cleanup and tests around gRPC transcoding error handling #43745
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix auth exception stopping QUIC connection listener #43730
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1984327 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Update gRPC and Protobuf dependencies #43709
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0-rc2

entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix use of bitwise '&' with boolean operands in palrt #3349

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Blazor input display language problem #9928
  • Centered StackLayout within StackLayout does not center #9927
  • CollectionView: add events ItemClicked and ItemDoubleClicked #9921
  • CollectionView: ScrollTo does not work [Windows11, Android11/12, iOS not tested] dotnet --version: 6.0.400 #9920
  • [Enhancement] Add different input types for prompt #9913
    Backlog
  • When ListView is the only element in a ContentPage in a shell tabview, listview last items don't render on screen (iOS) #9911

Closed

  • Cant add a variable to Grid rows more than once. #9493
  • Fails build on Microsoft-openjdk@17 #9912
  • MAUI App bundle size is too large on release mode #9453
    Backlog
  • RefreshView containing SwipeView causes AccessViolationException on Windows #9894
  • Pair to Mac failed with error "Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten' version '6.0.4' is lower..." #9800
  • Directory.GetFiles/CreateDirectory/Exists..etc throw System.UnauthorizedAccessException when only a folder is specified #9898
  • Auto [Routing] add #9885

PullRequests

Created

  • First load absolute image paths before trying drawables #9926
    .NET 6 + Servicing
  • Merge compiler warning fix from main/net7.0 #9925
  • [Windows] Fixes DatePicker format #9924
    community ✨
  • Correctly layout the WebView #9923
    .NET 6 + Servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22451.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22452.2 #9922
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix focused events in SearchBar #9918
    t/bug, area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Core] Fix ImageButton IsLoading property #9917
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [Android] Fix rendering using WebView without Source #9916
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Shorten the msi filenames #9915
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Remove pipelines check #9914
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix TypeConverts API Docs #9780
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Try fix API docs #9757
    area/docs 📓
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.6.1.7 to 1.7.0 #9845
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate.PerformFetch #7982
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Simplify ShellItem Parenting #9221
    area/shell 🐢, 7.0-rc2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changes to property converters / ValueComparer's in efcore 7 #28984
  • How to upgrade use of GetColumnName() method #28983

Closed

  • [net 6.0] [linux] Microsoft.Data.SqlClient is not supported on this platform #28934
  • dotnet ef is installed but does not work #28982

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.1 #28986
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.30.0 to 3.30.1 #28985
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Delete correct shared-key entity with in-memory provider #28979
